compareEditions.description: Microsoft Office is a suite of desktop productivity applications that is designed specifically to be used for office or business use. Microsoft Office is available in 35 different languages and is supported by Windows and Mac. It mainly consists of Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Access, OneNote, Outlook and Publisher applications.

products_included.title: Microsoft Word
products_included.text: It has never been easier to take a document from blank page to polished article. Create impressive documents with natural formatting tools designed to customize and bring out the best in your writing. Open and edit PDFs in Microsoft Word, then save them as a PDF or Word document.

product_about.title: About
product_about.text: Discover the new and improved version of the world’s favorite productivity suite, with this Microsoft Office Home & Student 2016. Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and OneNote have been upgraded and improved with new time saving features and a sleek, new look. Office 2016 is touchscreen optimised, fully cloud capable, and is accessible via Microsoft Web Apps, giving you the freedom to work from anywhere, on any device.
